title: Senior Multimodal AI Engineer
description: We're looking for a Senior AI Engineer to work on multimodal retrieval agents and vision-language models. Experience with transformer architectures and cross-modal learning required.

title: Autonomous Agent Developer
description: Join our team building autonomous AI agents with toolformer integration. Strong background in agent orchestration and function calling frameworks.

title: Open Source LLM Researcher
description: Research and develop open-weight large language models. Experience with distributed training and model optimization required.

title: Quantum Machine Learning Scientist
description: Lead quantum machine learning research with variational algorithms and quantum optimization. PhD in quantum computing or related field preferred.

title: Edge AI Engineer
description: Optimize AI models for mobile and IoT devices. Experience with model compression, quantization, and edge deployment required.

title: Neural Architecture Research Scientist
description: Research neural architecture search and automated machine learning. Strong background in evolutionary algorithms and neural network design.

title: Federated Learning Engineer
description: Develop federated learning systems with differential privacy. Experience with distributed systems and privacy-preserving ML required.

title: Causal Inference Scientist
description: Research causal discovery and inference methods for high-dimensional data. Strong statistical background and experience with causal modeling required.

title: Robotics Manipulation Engineer
description: Develop robotic manipulation systems using imitation learning. Experience with robotic control and computer vision required.

title: Synthetic Data Scientist
description: Create high-quality synthetic datasets using generative models. Experience with GANs, VAEs, and data augmentation techniques required.
